message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize its industry. This innovative solution comes with a comprehensive suite of features tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe in delivering unparalleled value to our clients, and we are confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, and we encourage you to consider this investment in your future success.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit higher than I was expecting. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget, and I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product if we can come to a mutually agreeable price.
